CmdLine: export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y software-properties-common &&     apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive &&     add-apt-repository -y ppa:uroni/urbackup &&     apt-get update &&     echo "urbackup-server urbackup/backuppath string /backups" | debconf-set-selections &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends urbackup-server &&     apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
